General.Name: Revathi Equipment Limited
General.Description: Semac Consultants Limited provides engineering and architectural services. It offers structural, electrical, public health engineering (PHE), fire protection, heating ventilation and air conditioning (HVAC), and LEED certifications and energy audit services. The company was formerly known as Revathi Equipment Limited and changed its name to Semac Consultants Limited in July 2023. Semac Consultants Limited was incorporated in 1962 and is based in Gurugram, India. Semac Consultants Limited is a subsidiary of Renaissance Advanced Consultancy Limited.

0.Name: Mr. Abhishek  Dalmia ACWA, AICWA, B.Com, B.Com., B.Com.(H), C.A., FCA
